moduleMetadataJson.name: Shell to Meterpreter Upgrade
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module attempts to upgrade a command shell to meterpreter. The shell
          platform is automatically detected and the best version of meterpreter for
          the target is selected. Currently meterpreter/reverse_tcp is used on Windows
          and Linux, with 'python/meterpreter/reverse_tcp' used on all others.
author: Tom Sellers <tom@fadedcode.net>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: Powershell::persist
options.description: Run the payload in a loop

options.name: Powershell::wrap_double_quotes
options.description: Wraps the -Command argument in single quotes

options.name: Powershell::method
options.description: Payload delivery method (Accepted: net, reflection, old, msil)

options.name: Powershell::Post::timeout
options.description: Powershell execution timeout, set < 0 to run async without termination

options.name: LHOST
options.description: IP of host that will receive the connection from the payload (Will try to auto detect).

options.name: LPORT
options.description: Port for payload to connect to.

options.name: HANDLER
options.description: Start an exploit/multi/handler to receive the connection

options.name: HANDLE_TIMEOUT
options.description: How long to wait (in seconds) for the session to come back.

options.name: WIN_TRANSFER
options.description: Which method to try first to transfer files on a Windows target. (Accepted: POWERSHELL, VBS)

options.name: PAYLOAD_OVERRIDE
options.description: Define the payload to use (meterpreter/reverse_tcp by default) .

options.name: BOURNE_FILE
options.description: Remote filename to use for dropped binary
